text_block_list.text:
―We're finally entering the summer training 
camp! Vodka is breathing heavily through her 
nose on the beach spread out before her.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Let's fight, Senpai! Sprinting on the beach, 
electrifying two Harons. I'll show you my speed!

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, who are you talking to? I'm already said 
to be a GI-rank. Do you think you can beat me?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
――I can win. If it's the Explode Running Method 
I came up with! Alright! Let's go, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, 
whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, 
whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, 
whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, 
whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, 
whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, 
whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Dammitttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt!

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Heheh, you're nothing more than this, after all♪

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Damn it! Just you wait. By the time the training 
camp is over, the beach champion will be…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Wait, no, no, no! This pattern's 
happening again! I knew it! A guy 
who's just lame is totally lame!
choice_data_list: Vodka, I need to talk to you…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hm? What's this? A trainer? There's 
no need to comfort me…
choice_data_list: Let's not kick the sand backwards.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Huh? With the sand behind me…? Oh, 
you mean the Explode Run? But if I 
don't kick hard, I'll lose power…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
…! I see!! This is the beach. If I kick 
back, my strength will escape. So……what 
should I do……? Think. Think……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
There had to be a way to run. Mom was fast, even 
if it was Dirt. I should be able to run faster 
than just cool.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
…! I see. Could this be… Um! Senpai! Could you 
challenge me again?

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Wh-What? What's this speed?! It's completely 
different from before…!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That's right, this is the run! Lower your center 
of gravity and drive your legs into the sand!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's called the 'Slash Running Method'! Don't 
let your power escape. Grip the horseshoes with 
all your might and move forward!

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I-I lost… I was so young…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
All right! Thanks for lending me your breasts, 
Senpai! Your power is real!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Let's pick up where we left off with the Twinkle 
Series. It'll be a piece of cake for you, 
Senpai. If you shine, it'll be a good landmark.

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Vodka, you…

The training camp is almost 
over. After the festival…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Man, festivals are nice every once 
in a while. Ah, I sold it!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I think I did. The old man at the yakisoba 
shop asked me to help out at night.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm really good at making yakisoba. I used to 
help out at my dad's stall.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Who cares about that? Thanks for everything 
during the training camp.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I think I figured it out during that beach race. 
The coolness I'm aiming for. In other words, I 
just need both, right?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Dad's coolness and Mom's strength. 
We just need to double it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'll definitely win with a cool run! 
Then I'll say something cool! That 
way, I'll always be a sore loser.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Of course, it's not as easy as it sounds. But 
don't worry. I can do it!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That's right. This baseless confidence is also 
my father's. Come to think of it, Mom said 
something about it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I don't get what you're talking about, Dad. That 
was when we started dating, but…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Dad told Mom during the Summer Festival.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
At the time, Mom was an open-mouthed 
girl on active duty. And Dad was just 
a cold-hearted older brother.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But what do you think was the reason why Mom 
confessed to you?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I don't think that's quite right. Dad's been playing a lot 
of games. Like 'I'll definitely become big!' and 'I'll be the 
happiest person in the world!'

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
”She's an interesting person to say such baseless things out 
loud.” And that's how she ended up going along with it. She 
pushed herself forward with the momentum.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. My heart is yours, Dad. 
And this body is mine.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'll definitely… become one with both of them! A 
good girl who can challenge and accomplish 
anything reckless.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm way stronger than I was before I joined you!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Of course! I was scared just from hearing about 
love, but now I'm probably……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Come to think of it, after Mom and Dad started 
going out, they said they rode home together.)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(A two-seater, huh? If I end up like that with a 
trainer on the way home from the training camp…)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Huh? A trainer driving? Me? Behind you? I see… 
Well then, excuse me…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wha…? You're holding my waist?! Then…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Boo!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: No, n-n-no. This is, um…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Chocolate banana! I just ate too 
many chocolate bananas at the store 
at night! It's true, dammit!!
